subtitleNullable: 6,126 images and corresponding lung masks, 4 categories
descriptionNullable:
### pneumonia CXR dataset
The dataset is organized into 3 folders (train, validation, test) and contains subfolders for each image category (Normal/COVID-19/Bacteria/Viral). There are 6,126 chest X-ray (CXR) images and 4 categories (Normal/COVID-19/Bacteria/Viral).
- 1,535 Normal
- 1,708 COVID-19
- 1,390 Bacteria pneumonia 
- 1,493 Viral pneumonia 
Ground-truth lung segmentation masks are provided for the entire dataset. 

### References
In pneumonia CXR dataset, the X-ray images are collected from the following repositories:
1. Chest X-Ray Images (Pneumonia): https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/paultimothymooney/chest-xray-pneumonia
2. COVID-QU-Ex Dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/cf77495622971312010dd5934ee91f07ccbcfdea8e2f7778977ea8485c1914df
